testcase.classname: Login Funtionality tests using Data Driven Testing
testcase.name: Check login is successful
testcase.system-out: Given User must navigate to the respective Browser..........................passed And User navigates to Login Page............................................passed When User enters valid "uname" and "password"...............................passed And User clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User is navigated to the homepage or views "Invalid credentials".......passed
